name: Rose Colored Lens
description:
WASD-  To move (Also use for main menu)

Left Shift- Run

Mouse-  Look around

Story:

You are trapped in a mental asylum, and you are stuck in it with her. Don't fall for her tricks, shes really good at manipulation.  You need to get out of this hell hole. You have to collect 8 bottles of liquor to forget her and to get out of this place alive! Don't listen to what she says about you. Find all those bottles and get out with your life!

Espero que sepas que esto fue para ti. de la tuya, ex frijol
